1370: Vastraid moved to Muelen straet.A.3 after marriage.
Got married to Hodine at age 22 in 1370.
Had a son with Hodine, Vastraid, at age 22.
1371: Had a son with Hodine, Thomas, at age 23.
1372: Had a daughter with Hodine, Soeten, at age 24.
1376: Had a son with Hodine, Sollen, at age 28.
1378: Had a son with Hodine, Alebaren, at age 30.
1379: Had a son with Hodine, Heideric, at age 31.
1383: Had a daughter with Hodine, Salome, at age 35.
Lost son Alebaren when Alebaren was 6 years old.
